name: Mother Simulator
description: It’s a humorous project about a young parent's difficult weekdays. If you feel worried, irritated, you don’t understand what’s going on and what you must do next, so don’t worry. We want to give you exactly these feelings in our game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
